pr_title: CB-8945 Ability to run tests against MOW Dev

timeline.bodyText:
Can we refactor this to smaller methods and do less in the catch block? It's kind hard to read.
Something like:
getMockBasedUser()
getRealUmsUser()
getTestParamUser()
timeline.author: lnardai
lnardai

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure about his change. At least the Owner tag should contain the creator's name not the CRN I think.
timeline.author: lnardai

replies.bodyText:
Unfortunately we had to upgrade this comparison, because of:

The account basis value is a string that will be converted into SFDC account ID format that serves as the primary key for the account. This is distinct from the CDP-internal account ID UUID that shows up in CRNs and many API calls.
...
The user basis value works along similar lines but results in the primary key for the user within the account.

from CDPCP Account Helper > Creating Test Users
For instance a mocked: "Cloudera-Creator-Resource-Name":"crn:altus:iam:us-west-1:qe-aws:user:cloudbreak-qe@hortonworks.com" and a real one: "Cloudera-Creator-Resource-Name":"crn:altus:iam:us-west-1:9d74eee4-1cad-45d7-b645-7ccf9edbb73d:user:9e6ff6c7-7a4b-4086-8989-731c2d57fbf7"
replies.author: aszegedi
